[[inst_hl_lhu_pcr]]
==== HL.LHU.PCR

*Syntax:* hl.lhu.pcr [<symbol>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhu_pcr.svg[HL.LHU.PCR encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA/PC_REL

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)
